data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 15,476 believers in Cabo Rojo against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cabo Rojo, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 15,476 believers in Cabo Rojo.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 29,528 people in the state of Cabo Rojo who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Cabo Rojo, Puerto Rico be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Boquerón
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Boquerón, Cabo Rojo, Puerto Rico.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Cabo Rojo that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Cabo Rojo, Puerto Rico, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cabo Rojo, Puerto Rico has a population of 47,600.

We estimate Cabo Rojo has 15,476 people who might know Jesus, 29,528 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,595 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Cabo Rojo, Puerto Rico know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
